title: Arthur Mercer
text:
Arthur Stanley Mercer (28 December 1902 – 2 October 1994) was an English professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="inside%20right">inside right</a> who played in the <a href="Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Chester%20City%20F.C.">Chester</a>, <a href="Wigan%20Borough%20F.C.">Wigan Borough</a>, <a href="Halifax%20Town%20A.F.C.">Halifax Town</a>, <a href="Sheffield%20United%20F.C.">Sheffield United</a>, <a href="Bristol%20City%20F.C.">Bristol City</a> and <a href="Bury%20F.C.">Bury</a>.
Personal life.
Mercer was the brother of fellow footballers <a href="David%20Mercer%20%28footballer%2C%20born%201893%29">David</a> and Richard. His nephew <a href="David%20Mercer%20%28footballer%2C%20born%201918%29">David</a> also became a professional footballer.
